title: Nur Muhammad Taraki
summary: Nur Muhammad Taraki (Pashto: نور محمد ترکی‎‎; 14 July 1917 – 8 October 1979) was an Afghan revolutionary communist politician, journalist and writer. He was a founding member of the People's Democratic Party of Afghanistan (PDPA) who served as its General Secretary from 1965 to 1979 and Chairman of the Revolutionary Council from 1978 to 1979.
